amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program by $25 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barrow amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Barrow.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barrow amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
